data.displayName: Kogan Energy for current FIRST members

fees.description: Other fees may apply. Information available at: koganenergy.com.au/terms-conditions
Disconnection fees may apply to manually de-energise a property. The fee will be passed on from your distributor and may vary.
Disconnection fees may apply to remotely de-energise a property. The fee will be passed on from your distributor and may vary.
Connection fees may apply to manually energise a property. The fee will be passed on from your distributor and may vary.
Connection fees may apply to remotely energise a property. The fee will be passed on from your distributor and may vary.

electricityContract.terms: Kogan Energy is provided by Powershop Australia Pty Ltd. We do not issue paper bills and require a credit card or bank details. For more information in relation to Kogan Energy and this offer, see full terms and conditions at: koganenergy.com.au/terms-conditions.
electricityContract.variation: We may vary your prices in accordance with our regulatory requirements. If we vary your prices we'll give you advance notice, usually by email

incentives.eligibility: $100 (incl. GST) sign-up credit for new Kogan Energy customers with an existing annual FIRST membership. Eligibility criteria and conditions apply â€“ see https://www.koganenergy.com.au/first-offers-terms/

eligibility.information: You must have a current annual FIRST membership. Further eligibility criteria and conditions apply.

singleRate.description: Time switch controlled hotwater services, space heaters and other dedicated loads, generally controlled between 11pm and 7am.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: This Kogan Energy offer is an ongoing contract (until you or we end it) with no exit fees.
